name: ujamii GmbH
description:
Whether for your own web project or in cooperation with agencies - our team has competences for comprehensive support in every area and offer tailor-made solutions for your web project. We connect technical aspects of web development, creative solutions in the area of design and logical views in the project consulting or the holding of trainings.
In order to work as efficiently as possible, we are focussing on the systems that make the best possible for us in the technical area.
